content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm the one who's been providing you with tips and recommendations, and I'm excited to hear about your progress with making homemade pasta and ricotta cheese!

However, I'd be happy to continue providing guidance and answering any questions you may have about making ricotta cheese or pairing it with your fresh pasta. Feel free to ask me anything, and I'll do my best to help!

If you're ready to share, how's your ricotta-making journey going so far? Have you tried any recipes or techniques that you'd like to share?
